startpage.introtext: My name is Klaus Hörmann-Engl. I am web developer, and this is my Web Zeug (web stuff).

klaus.text: Here you can lear more about me. What my interests are and the projects I participated or developed.
klaus.title: More about myself

rechnen.text: With help of this application you can generate math worksheets for the 4 basic arthmical operations. Greate when you have children in school.
rechnen.title: Generate math worksheets

piviz.text: This is a simple colorful visualization of the first 1000 digits of PI.
piviz.title: Color visualization of PI

youtube.text: I'm not a Youtuber, but from time to time I make a video.
youtube.title: My Youtube videos
